text.long: Everything in Coffin Canyon flows from a single value: Quality. It represents training, toughness, nerve, and luck. When Quality drops, everything becomes harder.

quality.title: Quality
quality.short: Quality defines how many dice you roll for most actions.
quality.long: Quality represents training, toughness, nerve, and luck. It is used for attacks, morale, special abilities, and environmental tests.

guidelines.description: Basic trained human / small monster / civilian
Elite unit / large monster / hard-to-kill beast
Leader unit / low hero / powerful monster
High hero / very large or mystically powerful monster
Epic supernatural kaiju, titan, or super-heavy mechanical unit

the_roll.title: The Roll
the_roll.short: Roll a number of d6 equal to current Quality. 4+ = success.
the_roll.long: Roll d6s equal to current Quality. Each 4, 5, or 6 counts as 1 Success. One or more successes usually mean the action succeeds. Some rules scale with total successes.

mechanics.pool: Roll d6s equal to current Quality.

defense_and_damage.title: Defense & Damage
defense_and_damage.short: If successes exceed Defense, damage is dealt.
defense_and_damage.long: Defense is a passive value representing positioning, cover, armor, or skill. If Successes exceed Defense, the attack hits. Each success beyond Defense deals 1 damage.
defense_and_damage.definition: Passive value representing positioning, cover, armor, or skill.
defense_and_damage.resolution: If Successes > Defense, the attack hits. Each success beyond Defense deals 1 damage.
defense_and_damage.exceptions: Defense does not apply to terrain damage, automatic damage, or environmental effects.

six_based_effects.title: Six-Based Effects
six_based_effects.short: A roll may only resolve one six-based bonus.
six_based_effects.long: A single roll may only resolve one six-based bonus. Never more than one.
six_based_effects.golden_rule: A single roll may only resolve ONE six-based bonus.

natural_six.name: Natural Six
natural_six.effect: If the attack hits, it deals at least 1 damage even if Successes do not exceed Defense.
natural_six.restriction: Does not apply if the attack does not hit.

lucky_break.name: Lucky Break
lucky_break.trigger: All dice in a Quality roll result in 6s.
restrictions: Cannot be used for damage or attacks

choices.name: Deadeye
choices.effect: Gain +1 die to the next roll this activation

six_based_effects.example: Attacker Q2 rolls 6,6 vs Defense 4. Choose Natural Six (1 damage) OR Lucky Break (tempo).

critical_failure.title: Critical Failure
critical_failure.long: If all dice in a Quality roll show 1s, the action fails and the model becomes Shaken. Terrain or scenario rules may apply additional consequences.

quality_tracking.title: Tracking Quality
quality_tracking.short: Track Quality openly; at 0 the model is removed.
quality_tracking.long: Quality is tracked openly using a die behind the model. It is never rolled. When Quality reaches 0, the model is removed immediately.
quality_tracking.on_table: Place one d6 behind the model as a tracker only.
quality_tracking.reduction: Reduce Quality immediately when damage, morale loss, or hazards occur.
quality_tracking.quality_zero: Remove the model from play immediately.
quality_tracking.design_intent: Players should be able to judge risk and collapse at a glance.
